title: Design and Implementation of a Mobile-Based Language Education Technology Recommendation System

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design knowledge and mobile technology proficiency at the secondary level
context.additional_context: A course supporting in-service professionals in effectively integrating mobile technology in language education settings, developing practical solutions through team-based projects in digitally equipped environments.

learning_goals: Learners will identify at least three mobile technologies appropriate for language education objectives and connect them to instructional strategies
Learners will apply a recommendation algorithm similar to the Tech Select system to design project-based assignments
Learners will develop criteria to evaluate the pedagogical utility of mobile technologies and analyze field cases with over 80% accuracy
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
